titles: The drunkard's character, or, A true drunkard with such sinnes as raigne in him viz. pride. Ignorance. Enmity. Atheisme. Idlenesse. Adultery. Murther. with many the like. Lively set forth in their colours. Together with Compleat armour against evill society. The which may serve also for a common-place-booke of the most usuall sinnes. By R. Iunius.
author: Younge, Richard.
publisher: Printed by R. Badger, for George Latham, at the Bishops-head in S. Pauls Cuhrchyard [sic],
notes: The words "pride. .. Atheisme." and "Idlenesse. .. Murther." are enclosed in brackets on the title page.
"Compleat armour against evill society" has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Variant: title page partly in another setting, reading ".. pride. Enmity. Ignorance. Atheisme. ..".
